scenes.description: Nanashi Mumei performs the song 'Call your name'.
MC section where Mumei talks about her song selection and prepares for a guest performance.
Nanashi Mumei and Tokoyami Towa perform a duet of 'Amanojaku'.

subtitles.original: I said, I'll give all my love to you.
subtitles.english: I said, I'll give all my love to you.

subtitles.original: Dreamed a new house, some place to be at peace.
subtitles.english: Dreamed a new house, some place to be at peace.

subtitles.original: But things changed suddenly.
subtitles.english: But things changed suddenly.

subtitles.original: I lost my dreams in this disaster.
subtitles.english: I lost my dreams in this disaster.

subtitles.original: We don't know what is wrong tonight.
subtitles.english: We don't know what is wrong tonight.

subtitles.original: Everybody's got no place to hide.
subtitles.english: Everybody's got no place to hide.

subtitles.original: No one's left and there's no one to go on.
subtitles.english: No one's left and there's no one to go on.

subtitles.original: All I know is my life is gone.
subtitles.english: All I know is my life is gone.

subtitles.original: I'm crying, missing my lover.
subtitles.english: I'm crying, missing my lover.

subtitles.original: I don't have the power on my side forever.
subtitles.english: I don't have the power on my side forever.

subtitles.original: Oh, where is my lover?
subtitles.english: Oh, where is my lover?

subtitles.original: And I got no power.
subtitles.english: And I got no power.

subtitles.original: I'm standing alone, no way.
subtitles.english: I'm standing alone, no way.

subtitles.original: Calling out your name!
subtitles.english: Calling out your name!

subtitles.original:
Tada! That was "Call your name". I hope you
enjoyed and didn't feel... uh, too much anguish.
subtitles.english:
Tada! That was "Call your name". I hope you
enjoyed and didn't feel... uh, too much anguish.

subtitles.original:
Uh, I just had a realization that all of the songs
I'm going to perform today are kind of depressing.
subtitles.english:
Uh, I just had a realization that all of the songs
I'm going to perform today are kind of depressing.

subtitles.original: But I'm fine! Everything's fine!
subtitles.english: But I'm fine! Everything's fine!

subtitles.original:
But now I will have guests join me
for some performances.
subtitles.english:
But now I will have guests join me
for some performances.

subtitles.original:
They will join me for this very emo section
of the debut... the 3D debut.
subtitles.english:
They will join me for this very emo section
of the debut... the 3D debut.

subtitles.original: Uh, but who could it be? Who will be next?
subtitles.english: Uh, but who could it be? Who will be next?

subtitles.original: Stay tuned to find out!
subtitles.english: Stay tuned to find out!

subtitles.original:
I mean, I should ready myself. Okay, I'm ready,
I'm ready. da da da da da... I'm ready.
subtitles.english:
I mean, I should ready myself. Okay, I'm ready,
I'm ready. da da da da da... I'm ready.

subtitles.original: 僕がずっと前から思ってることを話そうか
subtitles.english:
Shall I tell you what I've been thinking
for a long time?

subtitles.original: 友達に戻れたらこれ以上は望まないさ
subtitles.english:
If we could go back to being friends,
I wouldn't ask for more.

subtitles.original: 君がそれでいいなら僕だってそれで構わないさ
subtitles.english:
If you're fine with that,
I'm fine with it too.

subtitles.original: 嘘つきの僕が吐いた反対言葉の愛のうた
subtitles.english:
A love song of opposite words
spoken by a liar like me.

subtitles.original: 天ノ弱 Lyrics · Composition: 164
subtitles.english: Amanojaku Lyrics · Composition: 164

subtitles.original: 今日はこっちの地方はどしゃぶりの晴天でした
subtitles.english:
Today in this area,
it was a downpour of clear skies.

subtitles.original: 昨日もずっと暇で一日中忙しかった
subtitles.english:
Yesterday was also free all day,
I was busy the whole time.

subtitles.original: 別に君のことなんて考えてなかったりしなかったり
subtitles.english:
I wasn't exactly not thinking about you,
or maybe I was.

subtitles.original: いやでもちょっと本当は考えてたかもなんて
subtitles.english:
No, but actually,
maybe I was thinking about you a bit.

subtitles.original: メリーゴーランドみたいに回る
subtitles.english: Spinning like a merry-go-round.

subtitles.original: 僕の頭ん中もグルグルさ
subtitles.english: Inside my head is spinning round and round too.

subtitles.original: この両手から零れそうなほど
subtitles.english: So much that it seems to spill from these hands,

subtitles.original: 君に貰った愛はどこに捨てよう
subtitles.english:
where should I throw away
the love I received from you?

subtitles.original: 限りのある消耗品なんて僕は
subtitles.english: Limited-life consumables, I...

subtitles.original: 要らないよ
subtitles.english: ...don't need them.

subtitles.original: 僕がずっと前から思ってることを話そうか
subtitles.english:
Shall I tell you what I've been thinking
for a long time?

subtitles.original: 姿は見えないのに言葉だけ見えちゃってるんだ
subtitles.english:
Even though I can't see you,
only your words are visible.

subtitles.original: 僕が知らないことがあるだけで怖くなりそうだ
subtitles.english:
I feel like I'm getting scared just by
there being things I don't know.

subtitles.original: ぶら下がった感情が綺麗なのか汚いのか
subtitles.english:
Whether these dangling emotions
are beautiful or dirty,

subtitles.original: 僕にはまだわからず捨てるあてもないんだ
subtitles.english:
I still don't know,
and I have no place to throw them away.
